item.description:
Update 3/6/11:  We have been notified that dinner will be served 7-8pm, Dancing is 8pm-11pm.  The entrance fee whether you eat dinner or not is $10.00.  We will be meeting there at 7PM for dinner, if you will be arriving after that, please include that in your RSVP.  We will be closing this RSVP at noon on Tuesday 3/8/11 in order to put in our final count.  If you have RSVP'd for this event and will no longer be attending, please change your RSVP, if you are now RSVPing for this event, please ensure that we receive your full name and DOB.  Anyone not on our list, will not be allowed access to the Base.

 

 

 

Don't Call Me Shirley is having a St. Patrick's Day party at Hanscom AFB.

We know we love to listen and dance to the sound of this great cover band, so lets go out and have a good time.

In order to gain access to the Airforce base we must forward a list of attendee's First & Last names, and birthdates.  With this information a Security clearance list will be at the Guard's station and you will be able to proceed to the Minuteman Club.  WHEN YOU RSVP FOR THE EVENT PLEASE ANSWER THE QUESTIONS AND WE WILL HANDLE TURNING IT OVER TO SECURITY CLEARANCE. 

So shine up those dancing shoes and come on out to Hanscom for a Rocking Good time with our good friends DCMS.

Hope to see you all there.

Donna & Janet
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the Organizers once inside the Function room
item.why: Because DCMS is an Awesome band, we like to have fun and have a great circle of friends.
item.name: Don't Call Me Shirley @ Hanscom Airforce Base
